name: Web1 Student Project
tagline: Basic Multi-page Website for University Course
description: A simple university assignment for Web Development course (Web1 - HCMUS). Basic multi-page website with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, featuring user login, search, blog comments, and contact form.

responsibilities: Built basic HTML pages with Bootstrap 5 styling
Implemented JavaScript for user authentication and API calls
Created responsive layout using CSS and Bootstrap grid
Integrated simple REST API for data fetching

features: Multi-page website (Home, About, Blogs, Gallery, Contact)

highlights: First experience with REST API integration
Applied basic responsive web design principles
Learned JavaScript DOM manipulation and event handling
